fee.label: Suggested Donation
fee.description: or what you feel is right

item.description:
The December Meet-Up will be held at Doggie Day in the South End. Due to other meet-ups, we will be meeting from 10 am until noon. Because this is an indoor location, it is very important that you RSVP correctly - number of people and dogs, whether or not you will make it.

Also, even though the venue is free, Doggie Day is requesting that members of all Meet-ups being hosted at their facility bring donations from the Boston MSPCA Wishlist. The group that supplies the most donations will win a party at Doggie Day!!

The link to the wishlist is: http://www.mspca.org/...

Hope everyone can make it!!!




Cancellation procedure: If it is raining, too hot, too cold, etc. a cancellation notice will be sent via email and posted on the meetup website 2 hours prior to the meetup time.

Please note: Meetup.com charges each group a $15 a month meetup fee. This is a GROUP fee and if not paid, our Boston French Bulldog meetups, would not exist.

The organizer is in charge of paying this fee every month. It would be greatly appreciated if at each meetup, each member can submit a donation that goes towards the monthly $15 fee. Give $1, give $10. If at the end of the meetup, the organizer has not collected enough to meet the $15, she will pay the difference. If she receives more than $15, the extra would go towards the next meetup.

Looking forward to seeing everyone there!

In order to allow payment by PayPal, I had to put a minimum "Suggested Donation." This is just to cover the meetup.com fee. You can give whatever you feel is appropriate. The cost is $15 per month, so you don't have to give every month either. Whatever works for you. And you can do it through PayPal or at the MeetUp. Hope this helps!!

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston French Bulldog December Meetup
